fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Poltergeist** (Unlimited uses): Haunt a player each night, causing their role to be hidden from the Town the following day. The haunted player will appear as "Haunted" if investigated.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, Luigi gains the ability to **Possess** (1 use): Choose a player to possess, gaining control over their actions for one night. The possessed player will be notified that they were possessed and cannot perform any actions that night. Luigi's own abilities will be disabled while possessing another player.
- Luigi can choose to **Reveal** himself as Luigi at any time, displaying a unique Luigi death animation when killed.
